extendedInfo.description: Fun and MemorableConnected Mind makes serious learning fun and memorable for everyone by radically changing computer based mind mapping and brainstorming. Do you want a mind map that is fun to draw and easy to remember? Do you want to be creative with your brainstorming but still have the underlying structure and discipline of a computer based mind map? Try out Connected Mind today.Revolutionary free hand drawingUsing Connected Mindâs revolutionary freehand drawing features you can quickly create unique mind maps that are very easy to maintain. Itâs just like using pen and paper but better. Connected Mind takes full advantage of touch interfaces, which are perfect for the hand-drawn approach. This gives you complete control over the layout of your maps. You can easily include images and shapes or select from a rainbow of colors and fonts to personalize your maps. Simple touch screen commands provide direct and intuitive control. Tap anywhere on a branch to change or resize, press down to reposition the branch on the canvas or press the end of the branch to quickly relink it to a new parent.Safe, secure and available everywhereBacking up your mind maps in the Connected Mind cloud is a breeze, free of charge and ensures your masterpieces always stay safe and secure. Once in the cloud you can continue to play with your favorite mind maps on any other android tablet or phone, iPad or a windows/mac/chromebook computer that has Chrome <http://goo.gl/4G0SJ> installed.What is Mind Mapping?Mind mapping helps you learn to visually organize and link concepts, ideas, words and images around a central topic.  In todayâs world we suffer from information overload. Connected Mind provides you with a creative way to structure the information so that it makes sense to you personally.Helping students learnWhen you learn a new concept, you add it to the appropriate place in the mind map. In order to do that, you have to analyze the patterns, structures, and connections of concepts within your topic. This promotes better understanding, memorization, and recall, as well as the ability to apply knowledge in new situations. Connected Mind offers enough flexibility to maintain interest and encourage curiosity while still providing the structure that keeps you on track as a learner.Cool Features â 34 different fontsâ 38 different character sizesâ 27 resizable shapes â Beautiful color gradient fillsâ Unlimited choice of colorsâ Unlimited custom imagesâ Size and clip images to any of the 27 shapesâ Complete control over map layoutâ Unlimited undo & redoâ Backup mind maps to the Connected Mind cloudâ Play with you maps on multiple devices â Android, iOS and Chromeâ Share an image of your mind map with friendsâ Delete or rename mapsTech Stuffâ Supports Froyo, Gingerbread, Honeycomb, Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Beanâ Pinch-zoom and double tap to zoom in/outâ Autosaves when you leave the appâ Works offlineâ Import mind maps created in Freemind format via the Chrome versionâ Share a Mind Map image with any installed app that can accept images, such as Messaging, GMail, Twitter, etcâ Automatic smoothing of hand drawn linesâ No account or login required - uses your existing Google sign inâ Supports 2 factor authentication

reviews.comment: Beautiful
reviews.author: Jim James

reviews.title: Excellent tool
reviews.comment: This mind mapping tool is really easy to use and I like its free flowing arms. Allows a little creativity with what is usually quite a structured tool. Very cool well worth the cost.
reviews.author: Cheryl Tansey

reviews.title: The best of them all
reviews.comment: Of all the mind mapping apps on here, this is the most free flowing and has the most options. Well worth the price.
reviews.author: Sean Maysonet

reviews.title: Very flexible and creative
reviews.comment: The most creative mindmapping and brainstorming tool that I have used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Word wrap
reviews.comment: After learning how word wrap was supposed to work it worked just fine......good program
reviews.author: Johnny Cash

reviews.comment: Shapes not recognizably connected. Unable to collapse branches for clearer view. Gives options to import pics from locations that it cannot access. When pulling up labeling for shapes or lines, keyboard does not come up and the place to get it is non obvious. Otherwise pretty app, but not intuitive for me like other mind map apps.
reviews.author: Scott Ripley

reviews.title: Great ap, and I just got a handle on the cloud save too!
reviews.comment: Have used and loved this app for a while now. Love that cloud save now available, and now that I figured the cloud out, I have increased my rating to five stars. :)
reviews.author: Manda Imms

reviews.title: Map Your Mind Around This!
reviews.comment: It\'s a 10 Star App, and I\'m giving it 9. Only problem I have, too many menus. Wish the text, undo, delete and the other main functions were on the Toolbar, and the sub menus were where the MAIN MENU is now, and/or a long tap menu. When you\'re critiquing, you\'re tapping like a banshee lol. App is awesome, Thank You!
reviews.author: Tony Gugliuzza

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: Wow im amazed. The app is wonderful. The learning curve is short. The app is just so unique apnd intuitive. Just contacted the developer and got a genuine reply.  One change would be to expand the working area better. Im having a hard time at the edges.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app - best mind mapping tool
reviews.comment: I have tried many different mind mapping tools on my tablet and Connected Mind is the best by far. A great way to arrange those chaotic thoughts into some kind of order.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simplemind Bummer
reviews.comment: Wish I had seen this b4 shelling out $5 for simplemind app. This app has way cooler features! Just a better app all around. Kudos 2 the developer! Spot on with this little gem.  \"what\'s your name earthman\"
reviews.author: Michael Merging

reviews.title: Great apps & responsive developer
reviews.comment: Ease of use and fantastic response from dev.  Still learning how to use it to the fullest. Prefer the ability to have the branches stick to the 2 or more connected nodes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful App
reviews.comment: Cool app. I saw the video. Bought it to find that it cannot render arabic font correctly. Words are sepperated and inverted. Ok thankfully the Dev called and I detailed the issue. He promised to fix. Update: The dev says it is an Android 2.x problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: very good app. But the possibility to copy and paste nodes/branches and having the collapse/expand control would make it perfact. Thanks
reviews.author: acuturis acuturis

reviews.title: Cool but please add the help section to it
reviews.comment: Its cool, i like it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top mind mapper for Android
reviews.comment: This app gets more and more professional with each update. Keith\'s system requires you to focus on the visual layout of your ideas, and helps you focus and think through how things connect and what dependencies really exist. Fantastic web client on Chrome. Wholeheartedly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Best mindmapping for android. Love how you can draw the lines squiggly and they stay that way. Only thing I miss is being able to draw my own figure in the app (as opposed to importing images I\'ve sketched in another app).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DrDave South Africa
reviews.comment: I bought it on a chance I love it and I will help it improve
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app blows
reviews.comment: Not what I would expect for a mind mapping app. Doesn\'t even connect the shapes in any useful way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: As a revision tool this scores 10/10
reviews.comment: Nothing fancy here,  at first glance it looks quite ordinary & second best to some of those bells & whistles apps. But the cleverness here is in the design, it really helps with memory recall, you don\'t waste your time designing pretty maps, you just create spider-grams intuitively & it really helps with your revision. Have tried out a few mind maps and they don\'t come close to this.
reviews.author: A Google User
